title: Night-time city driving with frequent braking.
caption: A red car drives down a city street at night with frequent braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.3 m/s). There are 24 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving down a city street at night. There are many other cars on the road, and the traffic is quite heavy. The street is well-lit with streetlights and neon signs. The weather is clear and the visibility is good. There are several traffic lights and stop signs along the road, and the cars are following the traffic rules.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving down the city street at night with frequent braking. The braking events are likely due to the heavy traffic and the need to slow down and stop at traffic lights and stop signs. The red car is maintaining a safe distance from the other cars on the road and following the traffic rules. The driver is being cautious and attentive to avoid any accidents or collisions.
